componentAttributes.Page1Description: Please provide your Contact information so we can check and see if you already have an Account

componentAttributes.authorizationcheckboxlabel: I have read and voluntarily sign this Authorization, Waiver, and Release.
componentAttributes.existingAccountMessage: It looks like your account is already in our system, please click "Login to my Account" and then click "Forgot Your Password" to reset your password. If that doesn't work, call us at (888)888-8888 M-F between 8AM and 5PM.
componentAttributes.existingActiveUserMessage: It looks like your email is already in our system, please click "Login to my Account" and then click "Forgot Your Password" to reset your password. If that doesn't work, call us at (888)888-8888 M-F between 8AM and 5PM.
componentAttributes.existingContactMessage: It looks like your email is already in our system, please click "Login to my Account" and then click "Forgot Your Password" to reset your password. If that doesn't work, call us at (888)888-8888 M-F between 8AM and 5PM.
componentAttributes.footer: If you are having trouble logging in or need help, call us at (888)888-8888.
componentAttributes.passwordMismatchError: Password and Confirm Password do not match.  Please re-enter.
componentAttributes.patternMessage: Your Password must be  at least 9 characters
